# Column naming convention

As you can see in the next cell, the naming of the columns must follow a precise convention in order to be able to use your dataframe `experimental_data` with this package.

```{r setup}
library(somar)

str(somar::experimental_data.df)
```

<a href="./conception.html">Conception</a>
